Astral devas are the elite messengers and emissaries of the celestial realms, serving deities and celestial armies by delivering messages, performing reconnaissance, and providing support for those in need of aid. They watch over planar travelers and take powerful mortals under their wings to mentor them. Astral devas carry scrolls containing important messages and other celestial secrets. Astral devas can form spontaneously from the souls of exceptional good-aligned mortals, but are also sometimes created from such souls intentionally by deities or demigods. In the later cases, astral devas often bear physical features that mark them as closely affiliated with that deity. An astral deva created by Sarenrae, for example, might have hair made of fire, while one created by Torag might look more dwarven, and one created by Desna could have butterfly wings instead of feathered wings. It’s not unusual for astral devas created by lawful good or chaotic good deities to share their creators’ alignment. **[Recall Knowledge - Celestial](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 32 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27 [Astral Deva](/Monsters.aspx?ID=16) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 19 **Perception** +26; darkvision **Languages** [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19); [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +24, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +26, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +28, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +24 **Str** +8 **Dex** +4 **Con** +5 **Int** +4 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +6 **Items** _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)_ --- **AC** 36 **Fort** +27 **Ref** +26 **Will** +22 +1 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 285 **Weaknesses** evil 15 **Traveler’s Aura** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) 20 feet. Creatures in the astral deva’s aura are protected from ambient environmental damage from any plane, including severe and extreme heat and cold as well as more exotic dangers. The astral deva is never flat-footed to creatures within its aura.
**Messenger’s Amnesty** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) An astral deva with a message to deliver is continually protected by the effect of [_sanctuary_](/Spells.aspx?ID=266) (DC 32). If the deva breaks the [_sanctuary_](/Spells.aspx?ID=266), the effect returns if the deva ceases hostility for 10 minutes. --- **Speed** 40 feet, fly 75 feet **Melee** _holy warhammer_ +30 ([Good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 2d8+22 bludgeoning plus 1d6 good **Divine Innate Spells** DC 36, attack +28 - **Cantrips (7th)** [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171) - **1st** [Detect Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=65) (at will, evil only) - **2nd** [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will, self only) - **4th** [Discern Lies](/Spells.aspx?ID=74) (at will) - **7th** [Blade Barrier](/Spells.aspx?ID=24), [Divine Decree](/Spells.aspx?ID=82), [Divine Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=86), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Remove Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=250), [Remove Disease](/Spells.aspx?ID=251), [Remove Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=252) - **Constant (5th)** [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340) **Divine Rituals** DC 36 - **1st** [Angelic Messenger](/Rituals.aspx?ID=22) **Divine Armament** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) Any weapon gains the effect of a [holy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=299) property rune while an astral deva wields it. **Stunning Strike** **Requirements** The astral deva hit a foe earlier this turn with a weapon Strike. **Effect** The astral deva makes a weapon Strike against the foe. On a success, the foe must succeed at a DC 34 Fortitude save or become [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36). On a critical failure, the foe is [stunned 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) instead.
